title: Road (2014)(dvd5)(Nl subs) RETAIL SAM TBS
description:
Road (2014)

Dutch
Motorraces die worden gehouden op afgesloten openbare wegen zijn het gevaarlijkst
van alle racesporten. Coureurs snellen langs bomen en stenen muurtjes. Slechts op
twee plekken ter wereld wordt deze sport nog uitgeoefend: Ierland en het eiland
Man. Dit is het verhaal van, uit twee verschillende families afkomstige, racende
broers uit Noord-Ierland, die al dertig jaar deze vorm van motorsport domineren.

English
Brothers addicted to speed. At any price. Motorcycle road racing is the most
dangerous of all motor sports. One in which men compete at speeds of up to 200 miles
per hour on closed country roads. Roads that are lined with trees, telegraph posts,
stone walls. Ireland and the Isle of Man are two of the few places in the world where
the sport still survives. Narrated by Liam Neeson, this is the dramatic and poignant
story of two sets of brothers from Northern Ireland who have dominated road racing
for over thirty years. Two generations of one family that have been united by success.
And united by tragedy.
